thread.title: Trump to Reverse Obama’s Transgender Bathroom Guidelines
thread.title_full: Trump to Reverse Obama’s Transgender Bathroom Guidelines

author: Brian Flood
title: Trump to Reverse Obama’s Transgender Bathroom Guidelines
text:
Trump to Reverse Obama’s Transgender Bathroom Guidelines 
Ruling would affect transgender students in public schools Brian Flood | February 22, 2017 @ 10:03 AM Getty 
The Trump administration will revoke guidelines that allow transgender students to use bathrooms and locker rooms matching their chosen gender identity, according to the Associated Press . 
The sure-to-be divisive decision would be a reversal of an Obama-era directive issued in May that required public schools to grant bathroom access even if student records differ or others are uncomfortable. 
Press Secretary Sean Spicer said on Wednesday that President Trump believes the issue is for the states to decide without federal involvement, hinting that more information will come out later in the day. 
More to come… 9 Comedians Who Could Host Trump's White House Correspondents' Dinner (Photos) 
The White House Correspondents' Association will hold its annual dinner on April 29 at the Washington Hilton, but after President Trump had a hard time finding talent for his inauguration – who will host the event? 
Seth Meyers, Stephen Colbert, Larry Wilmore, Joel McHale, Conan O’Brien and Cecily Strong are among the liberal comedians that have hosted the event in recent years. So Who will be open to hosting during Trump's presidency? Getty Images 
Jeff Ross 
The roast master recently told TMZ that it would be his “patriotic duty” to emcee the event, saying, “It would be the greatest show ever.” TBS 
Jay Leno 
Leno has already hosted the dinner three times but appears to be the type of comic who wouldn’t discriminate against Trump if he’s asked to host for a fourth time. NBC 
Greg Gutfeld 
The Fox News personality and political satirist isn't a typical comedian but Trump isn't a typical president.
